directions: In a small bowl, combine ketchup, mayonnaise, salt, and hot pepper sauce.  Mix well.  Meanwhile, toast bread in toaster. Spread mixture on all 4 slices of toast; set aside.
Arrange lettuce leaves on the bread followed by 3 or 4 slices of tomato.  Top with another piece of bread.  Repeat with the other sandwich.
title: Quick Tomato Sandwich
